name: test_e2e_with_logs[228_CMD_PIPE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_PIPE_001` |
| **Name** | Password file piped to grep |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | pipe_chaining |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `cat /etc/passwd | grep root`
- **Encoded**: `cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%20%7C%20grep%20root`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 07:08:12.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_001-1768201692838-9y3im3 pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_001 uri=/?q=cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%20%7C%20grep%20root client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_001-1768201692838-9y3im3 pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_001 uri=/?q=cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%20%7C%20grep%20root client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
07:08:12.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_001-1768201692838-9y3im3 pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_001 uri=/?q=cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%20%7C%20grep%20root client=127.0.0.1
```
